item.title: Mystery Merchant
item.description: Mystery Merchant is an NPC that sells goods in exchange for special currency called Mystery Merchant Coin. For the sake of simplicity, there are two different types of merchants: City Merchant and Wandering Merchant. City Merchant City Merchants are merchants located specific in the 4 major cities : Velika, Allemantheia, Kaiator, and Highwatch. City Merchant locations are marked on the minimap, making them easy to find. A global system message – that Mystery Merchant Starc has appeared in one of the 4 major cities – signals that the City Merchant associated to the city will open in 5 minutes.
